channel.title: Suggestion to make in the game ( i swear it would be really cool!)
channel.description:
okej this would be master:: we need :: a npc & weapons... well i was wanting to let a npc make weapons upgrade.. so u got a scimitar .. well than u pay the npc 1milion for if u are lvl 1.. and than the scimitar is upgraded to ''scimitar +1'' .. that would be master wouldnt it? and if someone can make the stats better if its +1 so 10 attack power more or something like that than it would be finished like heaven!!!!!!! also an option :: by :: '' flamed fury1 ''
You could do it so you can upgrade from rune to dragon and from mith to addy etc.

item.title: Suggestion to make in the game ( i swear it would be really cool!)
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

No it wouldn’t. You’d just put in the chat logs, “deleteItem(995, 10000000);” and then like…delete the scimitar BEFORE, and add the scimitar NEXT.

It’d be easy, but because you posted IN THE WRONG FREAKING SECTION I’m not going to code it for you.

Read full topic
